
                            
                            <p>妈的，估计是外包，来了还要拍两张照片，差点给我拍到正脸，吃个外卖还要这么讲究吗？ <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/26/140458n0szhq066hnaajiq.png" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/26/140458n0szhq066hnaajiq.png"> </p>
